text: Hind bint Hamad Al-Thani (born 15 August 1984, Doha, Qatar) is the Vice Chairperson and current CEO of Qatar Foundation. Additionally, Sheikha Hind is the Chairperson of the Executive Committee of the Supreme Education Council (SEC), and the Board of Directors of the Global Social Responsibility Alliance. She is also Co-Chairperson of the Joint Advisory Board of Northwestern University Qatar. She holds an Executive MBA (EMBA) from HEC Paris in Qatar, a Masterâ€™s degree in Human Rights from University College London in the United Kingdom, and a bachelor's degree from Duke University In the United States. She is a former student of HEC Paris in Qatar. == References == Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Qatar Foundation people
title: Hind bint Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani
